title: Software Development Engineer II
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is looking for talented software engineers to build cloud infrastructure. You will design and develop distributed systems that power AWS services used by millions. Requirements: BS in Computer Science or equivalent, 3+ years of professional software development, experience with distributed systems, strong data structures and algorithms knowledge. Tech stack: Java, Python, AWS, DynamoDB, Lambda, Kubernetes. Remote options available for experienced candidates.
test_case_notes: Large global company (Fortune 500). Should not be penalized for HQ timezone (large company exception). Tests company size scoring and global company handling.
